TopicTitle: Banner for DLC blocking start screen

Articles.Content: Steam download, no buttons to leave the screen appear. I tried reinstalling but that accomplished nothing. It is completely unplayable for me now.

@FreakingoutOMG

Try going to the KSP folder (the one that contains the GameData folder) and opening "settings.cfg." Find the line that says "MISSION_SHOW_EXPANSION_INFO = True" and set it to "False." That should make it disappear next time you launch the game.
